Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lelion Way, around the back side of a large complex.
Room.LongDescription: It looks like a large shopping center, but you're on the wrong side of the complex to enter it. On the south, you can see a sign which reads "Deni's World of Spices". To the north, you can see (and smell) the Lyanden Swamp, a mushy wasteland of useless land.
